content.text:
# 2018 Prince Edward Island Scotties Tournament of Hearts

The 2018 Prince Edward Island Scotties Tournament of Hearts, the provincial women's curling championship for Prince Edward Island, was held January 4â€“9 at the Cornwall Curling Club in Cornwall, Prince Edward Island. The winning Robyn MacPhee team represented Prince Edward Island at the 2018 Scotties Tournament of Hearts.
Teams Entered
The Robyn MacPhee rink are the defending champions.
